QuestData.Title: Survival of the Fittest
QuestData.Description: The collar you took from the trapper is simple, but effective. Affixing the collar to a target will make them complacent and obedient to their Nightborne masters. Lilryia was able to reverse the spell using the traps you found.$b$bThe magics in the collar can now be used to cancel out the other collars.$b$bHow about giving the Nightborne a reminder that nature always finds a way?
QuestData.RewardText: I could hear their cries and see the carnage from here! That will teach the Nightborne to enslave creatures. Have they fallen so far during all those years under the shield?
